scripts.cleanBuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.cleanBuildProduction: npm run clean && npm run buildProduction
scripts.cleanWatch: npm run clean && npm run watch
scripts.clean: npm --workspaces --if-present run clean && npx shx rm -rf *.tsbuildinfo dist
scripts.deepClean: npm --workspaces --if-present run deepClean && npx shx rm -rf *.tsbuildinfo dist coverage jest temp package-lock.json npm-shrinkwrap.json .cache/* .cache/.[!.]* .cache/..?* node_modules/* node_modules/.[!.]* node_modules/..?*
scripts.reset: npm run deepClean && npm install --no-fund --no-audit && npm run build && (npm link --no-fund --no-audit || sudo npm link --no-fund --no-audit) && shx chmod +x bin/*.js
scripts.softReset: npx shx rm -f package-lock.json npm-shrinkwrap.json && npm install --no-fund --no-audit && npm run build && (npm link --no-fund --no-audit || sudo npm link --no-fund --no-audit) && shx chmod +x bin/*.js
scripts.postversion: npm run sync && npm run reset
scripts.git:status: git status && git branch -vv && git --no-pager diff dev origin/dev && git stash list && git fsck --full --no-reflogs
scripts.git:remote: git remote -v && git remote show origin
scripts.git:hardreset:main: git fetch origin && git checkout main && git reset --hard origin/main
scripts.git:hardreset:dev: git fetch origin && git checkout dev && git reset --hard origin/dev
scripts.git:hardreset:edge: git fetch origin && git checkout edge && git reset --hard origin/edge
scripts.runMeBeforePublish: npm run cleanBuild && npm run lint && npm run format && npm run test:coverage && npm run build && npm run updateHtmls
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run cleanBuildProduction && npm --workspaces pkg delete devDependencies scripts && npm pkg delete devDependencies scripts workspaces && npx shx rm -rf node_modules/* node_modules/.[!.]* node_modules/..?* package-lock.json npm-shrinkwrap.json && npm install --no-fund --no-audit --omit=dev && npm shrinkwrap --omit=dev
scripts.updateDependencies: npm --workspaces --if-present run updateDependencies && npx npm-check-updates -u && npm run reset
scripts.updateMatter:latest: npm install --save-exact @matter/main@latest && npm install && npm run reset
scripts.updateMatter:dev: npm install --save-exact @matter/main@dev && npm install && npm run reset
scripts.updateMatter:loc: npm install ../matter.js/packages/matter.js && npm install && npm run reset
scripts.install:eslint10:on: npm --workspaces --include-workspace-root pkg set "overrides.eslint=10.0.0" && npm --workspaces --include-workspace-root pkg set "overrides.@eslint/js=10.0.1" && npm --workspaces --include-workspace-root pkg set "devDependencies.eslint=10.0.0" && npm --workspaces --include-workspace-root pkg set "devDependencies.@eslint/js=10.0.1"
scripts.install:eslint10:off: npm --workspaces --include-workspace-root pkg delete "overrides.eslint=10.0.0" && npm --workspaces --include-workspace-root pkg delete "overrides.@eslint/js" && npm --workspaces --include-workspace-root pkg set "devDependencies.eslint=9.39.2" && npm --workspaces --include-workspace-root pkg set "devDependencies.@eslint/js=9.39.2"
scripts.install:scripts: npm install --no-fund --no-audit --save-dev --save-exact npm-check-updates shx cross-env marked
scripts.install:eslint: npm install --no-fund --no-audit --save-dev --save-exact eslint @eslint/js typescript-eslint eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-n eslint-plugin-promise eslint-plugin-jsdoc
scripts.docker:run:local:latest: npm run docker:rm:all && docker run -dit --restart always --name matterbridge-latest-local -v matterbridge-local-storage:/root/.matterbridge -v matterbridge-local-plugins:/root/Matterbridge -p 8283:8283 matterbridge:latest
scripts.docker:run:local:user:latest: npm run docker:rm:all && docker run -dit --restart always --name matterbridge-latest-local --user 1000:1000 -p 8283:8283 matterbridge:latest
scripts.docker:run:hub:latest: npm run docker:rm:all && docker pull luligu/matterbridge:latest && docker run -dit --restart always --name matterbridge-latest-hub -v matterbridge-local-storage:/root/.matterbridge -v matterbridge-local-plugins:/root/Matterbridge -p 8283:8283 luligu/matterbridge:latest
scripts.docker:run:local:dev: npm run docker:rm:all && docker run -dit --restart always --name matterbridge-dev-local -v matterbridge-local-storage:/root/.matterbridge -v matterbridge-local-plugins:/root/Matterbridge -p 8283:8283 matterbridge:dev
scripts.docker:run:hub:dev: npm run docker:rm:all && docker pull luligu/matterbridge:dev && docker run -dit --restart always --name matterbridge-dev-hub -v matterbridge-local-storage:/root/.matterbridge -v matterbridge-local-plugins:/root/Matterbridge -p 8283:8283 luligu/matterbridge:dev
scripts.docker:run:local:ubuntu: npm run docker:rm:all && docker run -dit --restart always --name matterbridge-ubuntu-local -v matterbridge-local-storage:/root/.matterbridge -v matterbridge-local-plugins:/root/Matterbridge -p 8283:8283 matterbridge:ubuntu
scripts.docker:run:hub:ubuntu: npm run docker:rm:all && docker pull luligu/matterbridge:ubuntu && docker run -dit --restart always --name matterbridge-ubuntu-hub -v matterbridge-local-storage:/root/.matterbridge -v matterbridge-local-plugins:/root/Matterbridge -p 8283:8283 luligu/matterbridge:ubuntu

scripts.docker:run:hub:24-ubuntu-slim: npm run docker:rm:all && docker pull luligu/matterbridge:24-ubuntu-slim && docker run -it --rm --name matterbridge-24-ubuntu-slim-hub -v matterbridge-local-storage:/root/.matterbridge -v matterbridge-local-plugins:/root/Matterbridge luligu/matterbridge:24-ubuntu-slim bash
scripts.docker:run:local:alpine: npm run docker:rm:all && docker run -dit --restart always --name matterbridge-alpine-local -v matterbridge-local-storage:/root/.matterbridge -v matterbridge-local-plugins:/root/Matterbridge -p 8283:8283 matterbridge:alpine
scripts.docker:run:hub:alpine: npm run docker:rm:all && docker pull luligu/matterbridge:alpine && docker run -dit --restart always --name matterbridge-alpine-hub -v matterbridge-local-storage:/root/.matterbridge -v matterbridge-local-plugins:/root/Matterbridge -p 8283:8283 luligu/matterbridge:alpine

scripts.docker:run:hub:s6-rc: npm run docker:rm:all && docker pull luligu/matterbridge:s6-rc && docker run -dit --restart always --name matterbridge-s6-rc-hub -v matterbridge-local-storage:/addons/matterbridge/.matterbridge -v matterbridge-local-plugins:/addons/matterbridge/Matterbridge -p 8283:8283 luligu/matterbridge:s6-rc
scripts.docker:buildx:create: docker buildx create --name matterbridge --driver docker-container --use && docker run --privileged --rm tonistiigi/binfmt --install all && docker buildx inspect --bootstrap && docker buildx ls
scripts.docker:buildx:hub:s6-rc: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 --no-cache --pull -f docker/Dockerfile.s6-rc -t luligu/matterbridge:s6-rc -t luligu/matterbridge:2026.2.4 --push .
scripts.docker:buildx:remove: docker rm -f buildx_buildkit_matterbridge0 && docker buildx use desktop-linux && docker buildx rm matterbridge && docker buildx ls
scripts.docker:rm:all: docker rm -f matterbridge-latest-local matterbridge-dev-local matterbridge-ubuntu-local matterbridge-24-ubuntu-slim-local matterbridge-alpine-local matterbridge-s6-rc-local matterbridge-s6-rc-hub matterbridge-latest-hub matterbridge-dev-hub matterbridge-ubuntu-hub matterbridge-24-ubuntu-slim-hub matterbridge-alpine-hub || true
scripts.publish:all:dev: node scripts/publish-workspaces.mjs --scope @matterbridge --tag dev && npm run reset
scripts.publish:all:edge: node scripts/publish-workspaces.mjs --scope @matterbridge --tag edge && npm run reset
scripts.publish:all:latest: node scripts/publish-workspaces.mjs --scope @matterbridge --tag latest && npm run reset
scripts.pack:all:local: node scripts/pack-workspaces.mjs --scope @matterbridge --tag local && npm run reset
scripts.pack:all:latest: node scripts/pack-workspaces.mjs --scope @matterbridge --tag latest && npm run reset
